sentences.cn: …一个由年轻音乐家组成的乐团。

sentences.en: A black silk tie completed the ensemble.
sentences.cn: 再配上一条黑色丝绸领带,整套服装就齐全了.

sentences.en: A pair of white shoes completed the striking ensemble.
sentences.cn: 一双白鞋配这套醒目的服装已完美无缺了.

sentences.en: After the last strip and the ensemble the lights went on.
sentences.cn: 大轴戏脱衣舞和全班加演结束以后,灯光亮了.

sentences.en: But'm Your Father, You Are My Son, And're In This Together. Ensemble.
sentences.cn: 但我是你的爸爸.你是我儿子. 我们在一起.我们是个团体.

sentences.en: Folk Music Ensemble " Arirang " " Blooming Flowers And Full Moon "
sentences.cn: 民乐合奏《阿里郎》朝鲜族乐曲《花好月圆 》.

sentences.en: Foote's most recent play, "Dividing the Estate," is an ensemble piece.
sentences.cn: 福特的最新戏剧《分房产》是个合演剧目。

sentences.en: He has mastered enough of the complexities of arrangement to write and score a piece for a chamber music ensemble.
sentences.cn: 他对改编的复杂之处已有了足够的掌握，能够谱写一部室内合奏曲了。

sentences.en: In - corporeal # 1 - for chamber orchestra. World premiered by The New Juilliard Ensemble. 1999.
sentences.cn: 形非形1 – 室内管弦乐队. 由新朱利亚 室内乐 队在林肯中心世界首演.

sentences.en: Oeuvrer ensemble au renforcement du syst è me multilat é ral pour la s é curit é collective.
sentences.cn: 一、共同致力于加强多边体系,维护集体安全.

sentences.en: Par exemple, vous pouvez mettre ensemble les mots sur la justice.
sentences.cn: 比如, 你可以把所有和司法有关的词放在一起.

sentences.en: Printed accessories paired with printed wardrobe equal the perfect summer ensemble.
sentences.cn: 印花饰品与印花衣品是夏日的最佳组合.

sentences.en: That person leads the instrument ensemble of the chorus in the church.
sentences.cn: 教堂的合唱表演是由那个人领奏.

sentences.en: The arrangement of the furniture formed a pleasing ensemble.
sentences.cn: 这些家具摆放得悦目而和谐.

sentences.en: There are four to six drummers in an ensemble.
sentences.cn: 每个演出团体有4到6名鼓手.

sentences.en: When an ensemble of old friends from his homeland arrived, however.
sentences.cn: 可是,当从祖国来的那帮老朋友到了之后.

words.tran_cn: 全体；总效果；全套服装；全套家具；合奏组

trans.tran_cn: 全体，整体；剧团；（尤指）乐团，<音>合奏，全套服装，总效果
trans.tran_en: a set of clothes that are worn together
